title: Movie Review Episode 10 - Good Night And Good Luck
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
Please join us for our movie review of Good Night and Good Luck.  The 2005 historical drama directed by George Clooney, centered on Edward R. Murrow's confrontation of Senator Joseph McCarthy.

Our Podcast Sponsor for the Episode:
https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/nicholas-macgrory/the-greatest-story-ever-told

For pictures for this episode and more go to our website at:  www.historyofthecoldwarpodcast.com/

Want to skip the ads and get right to the content, become a patreon subscriber here: www.patreon.com/coldwarpodcast
